title: r/Prorevenge Torture my Cat? I'LL RUIN YOUR LIFE!
description: r/Prorevenge OP works at a kennel, and one of her job perks is that she can board her pets for free. So when she takes vacation for a week, she entrusts her beloved cat to her coworkers' care. When she comes back, she finds that her cat has been badly neglected, underfed, underwatered, and is covered is excrement. This discovery sends OP into a rage and she starts plotting her revenge!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
